faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon olive oil?
What type of fat is in olive oil?
faqs.a: Mostly monounsaturated fats (about 3.3 g per tsp), with 0.6 g saturated.

faqs.q: Is extra virgin olive oil healthier?

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in olive oil?
faqs.a: Calories remain the same, but high heat may alter nutrients; use for low-medium temp cooking.
